job_title: Co-op Software Engineer — Build Next-Gen SaaS
job_description:
A leading legal technology company in Calgary is seeking a Software Developer, Co-op to join their Engineering team. In this role, you will design and deploy high-quality software while collaborating with colleagues. The ideal candidate is a 3rd or 4th year Computer Science or Engineering student with strong fundamentals and communication skills. This position offers a competitive salary and a hybrid work environment.

Benefits
4% vacation pay
Hybrid work model
Competitive compensation
Qualifications
Must have completed second-year coursework in Computer Science or Engineering.
Excellent computer science fundamentals required.
Strong written and verbal communication skills necessary.
Responsibilities
Design, develop, and deploy high-quality software code.
Contribute to technical scoping and planning for development work.
Communicate project progress and address impediments.
Skills
Critical thinking
Communication skills
Data structures
Algorithms
Programming languages
SQL
Education
Completed second-year coursework
3rd or 4th year Computer Science/Engineering student
